_sText:
King of the Hill prefab.

King of the hill is a game type where the teams must hold a certain point on the map for a set time (default on this prefab is 3:00 minutes). If the defending team is pushed off the "hill" their timer stops and the attackers timer starts. First team whose timer hits the goal wins the round.

I have added custom sounds for each team and have grouped each scoreboard separatly. If you want more than 1 scoreboard for each team around, simply duplicate the board and brushes (NOT THE ENTITIES ATTACHED TO THEM).
